p: Aromatic profiles of the whole flowering top and calyx were similar, with prominent compounds being linalool acetate (34.3%, 32.0%), linalool (26.5%, 32.9%), lavandulyl acetate (5.6%, 4.9%), terpinen-4-ol (5.3%, 7.0%), ( Z)-β-ocimene (4.5%, 5.4%), and ( E)-β-ocimene (2.9%, 1.6%). Both aromatic profiles, that of the whole flowering top and calyx, conform to the ranges established by the lavender ISO standard, showing that the composition of lavender essential oil is greatly influenced by the essential oils present in the calyx [ 17].
